Title: Edi
Description: Edi is a an IDE based text and UML editor. This project is based on WPF, MVVM, AvalonDock 2.0 and AvalonEdit.
HomeWiki:
Edi - The open source integrated development environment (IDE) based on AvalonDock 2.0 and AvalonEdit.

Edi is an open source IDE based editor build on AvalonDock 2.0 and AvalonEdit. It features:
  • Text editing with highlighting
  • Simple UML Class diagramming, and
  • Log4Net Log Document Viewer
  • Modern User Interface with Metro Design (aka Win8 Style) based on WPF and MVVM

Contribute
Contributions are welcome in code, design, or early bird testing feedback Alpha Version for next RC
